question: Airtel launched 'Office-in-a-Box' connectivity solutions for which state start-ups?
explanation: Airtel has recently launched \'Office-In-a-Box\' for start-ups registered under the Karnataka governmentâ€™s Start-Up Cell initiative. The Office-in-a-Box suite will be available to the over 100 start-ups registered with the Start-Up Cell and will add to their business efficiency. It will offer a range of services to support the business requirements of start-ups and is available on a scale-as-you-grow model with easy payment options. The services include voice and data solutions; audio and web collaboration; cloud services; payments bank services; go-to-market support across SMS, MMS, e-mail, voice, IVR and USSD; GPS and RFID-based tracking of assets.
